DISCORD_DESC: Komm und sprich mit uns auf Discord!

ERRORS.PASSWORD_REQ: Dein Passwort muss mindestens 8 Zeichen enthalten, davon mindestens eine Zahl!
ERRORS.USERNAME_LENGTH: Dein Nutzername muss mindestens 4 Zeichen enthalten

CONTENT.q: Wann wird die OpenBeta voraussichtlich starten?
CONTENT.a: Das wissen wir noch nicht. Wir wollen, dass alle Systeme ordnungsgemäß funktionieren. Wir wollen nicht, dass ihr ein komplett kaputtes Spiel spielt.

CONTENT.q: Muss ich bezahlen um auf dem Server zu spielen?
CONTENT.a: Nein, das musst du nicht. Der Server wird free-to-play sein.

Nein, definitiv nicht. Der Server wird keine P2W Elemente enthalten. Wir versuchen P2W zu vermeiden, dennoch erhalten VIP Spieler möglicherweise Komfortleistungen, aber alles wird ausgeglichen sein und für jeden erreichbar

CONTENT.q: Wie wollt ihr den Server finanzieren?
CONTENT.a: Es wir kosmetische Items, wie Kostüme und Waffenskins, im ItemShop geben. Der ItemShop wird auch Zufallsboxen, wie eine SP Upgrade Box in welcher Vollmondkristalle, Engelsfedern, Schutzrollen und Seelen sein können, beinhalten. Alle diese Boxen wären auch über in-game grinding oder andere Dinge erhältlich sein. Das selbe gilt für den VIP Status, welcher kostenlose NosBasar Nutzung, zusätzliche Inventarplätze und andere Komfortleistungen enthält.

CONTENT.q: Werden Skills, Equipment oder PSPs ausgewogen?
CONTENT.a: In der Openbeta - noch nicht. Wir arbeiten später daran, aber zuerst müssen wir die Basis Features fertigstellen.

CONTENT.q: Wir es das Land der Toten geben?
CONTENT.a: Wir wissen es noch nicht, aber wir haben Pläne für das Land der Toten.
Ja, definitiv. Zum Beispiel wollen wir Quests hinzufügen wie Sammel X von Gold von Mobs oder beende X Time-Spaces von einem Typen etc.

CONTENT.q: Was wird das maximale Level sein?
CONTENT.a: Wir sind noch in der Planungsphase von diesen Dingen, aber wir werden diese bald veröffentlichen.

CONTENT.q: Was für Raten wird der Server haben?
CONTENT.a: Wie oben (Frage zum maximalen Level), aber sie werden definitiv gering sein (ungefähr x5). Wir wollen ein langfristiges Spielerlebnis bieten und nicht ein Server sein auf dem du einen high-level Charakter in ein paar Stunden hast.

CONTENT.q: Wird mein Charakter gelöscht wenn ich die OpenBeta spiele?
CONTENT.a: Ja, die OpenBeta findet statt um unser technischen Rahmenbedingungen GameDesign zu testen. Alle Dinge die Spieler tun werden werden analysiert um mit Hilfe der Statistik das Gameplay zu optimieren.

CONTENT.q: Ich habe gehört, dass es NosWings schon früher gab, was war NosWings früher?
CONTENT.a: Wir waren der erste französische Privat Server mit 300 Spielern täglich für über ein Jahr. Unser Team bestand aus ein paar enthusiastischen Franzosen. Wir starteten im November 2016 und beschlossen im Januar 2018 zu schließen, weil wir nicht mehr mit den Möglichkeiten von OpenNos, neue Features zum Spiel hinzuzufügen, zufrieden waren. Dann haben alle NosWings verlassen und eigene Projekte gestartet um viele neue technische Dinge zu lernen. 1 Jahr und 6 Monate später, hat Blowa beschlossen das NosWings Projekt wieder zu eröffnen, er kontaktierte alte NosWings Mitglieder um ein neues Abenteurer mit mehr Möglichkeiten zu starten.
Die Antwort findest du im Discord (#what-is-noswings oder #faq)

FAQ.DESC: Kleines FAQ um die häufigst gestellten Fragen zu beantworten
FAQ.TITLE: Häufig gestellte Fragen

INFO: NosWings ist ein internationaler Privat Server, welcher von IT-Studenten ohne Absichten der Geldeinnahme erstellt wurde. Er steht in keinerlei Verbindung zur Entwell, und wird daher auch nicht von diesen unterstützt.

POLICY.CONFIRMATION:
By using any kind of feature available on this website, you agree to our Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service.
NosWings Team
POLICY.CHANGES_CONTENT: NosWings Team reserves the right to add, modify, and remove content from the Privacy Policy at any time. Please check this page periodically for changes.
POLICY.CHILDREN_CONTENT:
Another part of our priority, besides protecting datas, is protecting our users as well. We encourage parents to observe, participate in, or even monitor their children online activity.
NosWings does not collect any kind of information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately.
POLICY.CONTACT_US_CONTENT: If you have any question, inquiries, requests or complaints concerning this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us in Discord, or at support.noswings.com.
POLICY.COOKIES_CONTENT:
Like any others website, we are using cookies to store your preferences (languages...).
You can choose to disable them through your browser settings.
POLICY.DESC:
In this Privacy Policy, "we" represents NosWings Team. Your privacy is important for us and we take it very seriously.
We designed it to cover how we collect and use your information, how your information are protected, and how your information may be used.
For any questions, please contact our support.
POLICY.OPPOSITION_RIGHTS_CONTENT:
We make a commitment to offer you a withdrawal and opposition right in regards to your personal information.
Basically, it means that every user can request the removal their personal information at any time, in case they were to appear in diffusion lists or something.
If you wish to do so, simply contact our support.
POLICY.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_CONTENT:
You do not need to provide information directly in order to navigate on the site. However, when you use some functions on the site, such as accessing panels or more, you must be logged in, so we may ask for the following information:
- Username
- E-Mail address
- IP Address (To protect your accounts against third party stealing attempts)

Also, we are using in-game logs such as trades, gameplay actions, login hours, in-game chat messages.
Every personal information is collected thanks to the interaction between our website/our game and you only.
POLICY.SECURITY_CONTENT:
Every personal information collected by us is stored in a highly secured environment.
The latest technological innovations allow us to keep your sensitive information private.
Therefore, we are using:
- ID/Password
- High-level encryption for your passwords (latest security standards, BCrypt)
- Stored in a secured & isolated database
- A development team at your service for any questions about your credentials and security.
POLICY.THANKS:
Thank you for trusting us,
	NosWings Team.
POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
POLICY.THIRDPARTY_CONTENT:
This Privacy Policy does not apply to other websites linked to.
Thus, we are encouraging to read the respective Private Policy of these 3rd Party websites. It may include differents practices, obligations or instructions. We do not have any control over it.
POLICY.USE_OF_INFORMATION_TITLE: How do we use your information?
POLICY.USE_OF_INFORMATION_CONTENT:
User Accounts:
To provide access and manage your game account through the site, we're using your information in order to link your User Panel to your in-game character.
Statistical Analysis:
In order to learn how our game is growing and how his site is used, we gather and analyse the data that we collect. We may use those information to make QoL changes or to increase our site's functionalities.
POLICY.WARNING: First of all, if you are under 18 years old, please ask your parents to explain all the words used in this document that you may not understand.

TOS.ACCOUNTS_CONTENT:
- You are responsible for safeguarding the password you use to access our website content. You agree not to disclose your password to anyone. You must notify us immediately if you notice any breach of security linked to your account.
- NosWings Team will NEVER ask you, under no circumstances, for your password.
- You can get a huge penalty in case of password disclosure
- It is STRICTLY FORBIDDEN to trade/sell any resource (Gold, Items...) in exchange of any other resource of other private server, official server, or for IRL money.
TOS.CHANGES_CONTENT: NosWings Team reserves the right to add, modify, and remove content from the Terms of Service at any time. Please check this page periodically for changes.
TOS.CONFIRMATION:
By using any kind of feature available on this website, you agree to our Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service.
NosWings Team
TOS.CONTACT_US_CONTENT: If you have any question, inquiries, requests or complaints concerning the Terms of Service or our practices, please contact us in Discord, or at support.noswings.com.
TOS.DESC:
This document represents our Terms and Services.
It explains everything that you must agree with in order to use this website.
Read it thoroughly and carefully. By using this website, you agree to the agreements included in this document.
TOS.DISCLAIMER_CONTENT:
All information on this website is for general information purpose only.
NosWings does not make any warranties about the completeness, reliability and accuracy of those informations. Any action you take upon the information you find on this website is strictly at your own risk.
From our website, you can visit other websites by following hyperlinks to such external sites. While we strive to provide only quality links to useful and ethical websites, we have no control over the content and nature of these sites.
Please be also aware that when you leave our website, other sites may have different privacy policies and terms which are beyond our control. Be sure to check them before uploading any information.
TOS.RESPONSABILITIES_CONTENT:
NosWings is not responsible for any of your subscriptions. We are by no means linked to Entwell or Gameforge.
NosWings is a non-profit project made by IT students.
TOS.SANCTION_CONTENT:
- Every penalty related to the Item Shop is definitive.
- Different levels of penalties exist: they can range from a simple mute to a permanent ban. Our STAFF reserves the right to judge the gravity of the act.
- In case of penalty, if you wish to discuss about it, please contact our support. Only the person who gave you the penalty will be assigned to it. After one month your issue will be closed and it will not be possible to appeal further.
TOS.SHOP_CONTENT:
- Although NosWings is free, an Item Shop is available to support the game servers. No purchase is necessary and/or mandatory.
- We are using extern payement systems, thus we are not responsible if any issues occur. Please contact their support if there was a need.
- Any bugusing related to our Item Shop will lead to a definitive permanent ban without notice or negociation possibility.
- The content and the virtual currency bought in the Item Shop is distributed automatically. No refund (except special cases) will be allowed.
TOS.THIRD_PARTY_LINKS_CONTENT:
Our website may contain third-party links.
Thus, we assume no responsibility for any content in the links you visit.
TOS.TITLE: Terms of Service
TOS.WARNING: First of all, if you are under 18 years old, please ask your parents to explain all the words used in this document that you may not understand.
